ref.mixed-citation: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC). Report of the Conference of the Parties serving as the meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol on its seventh session, held in Durban from 28 November to 11 December 2011, Part Two: Action taken by the Conference of the Parties serving as the meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto.
